PPLoc: HR data policy on company intranet; Customers' privacy statement: http://www.csgi.com/legal/privacy
activities:
CSG Systems International, Inc. will use and otherwise process personally identifiable information from the EU about employees for purposes of: workflow management, such as assigning, managing and administering projects; compensation, including incentive plan administration and compensation analysis; performance and training management; leadership development; succession planning; benefits and personnel administration, such as administration of bonuses and pensions; IT helpdesk and support services; monitoring and enforcing compliance with company policies and procedures; and administration of certain global applications.

CSG Systems International, Inc. will use and otherwise process personally identifiable information from the EU about CSG Systems International, Inc. customer's consumers to provide billing and customer care to its customers.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
